Package vault

Interface Vault

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PasswordVault
    public interface Vault
    A Vault interface with attributes and methods to be implemented for any class that implements it.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String addNewSite​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String sitename)
      Adds a new site to the vault for the user, generates, stores, and returns a password for that site.
      void addNewUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Add a new user to the vault (with no site passwords).
      java.lang.String retrieveSitePassword​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String sitename)
      Retrieve the (plaintext) password for the user for the requested site.
      java.lang.String updateSitePassword​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String sitename)
      Generate, store, and return an updated password for a site associated with the user.

    • Method Detail

      • addNewUser

        void addNewUser​(java.lang.String username,
                java.lang.String password)
         throws InvalidUsernameException,
                InvalidPasswordException,
                DuplicateUserException
        Add a new user to the vault (with no site passwords). For example, a username and password is supplied, and the system does no verification or checking except that the username and password must be in correct formats, and the username cannot already be in the vault.
        Parameters:
        username - The username to be added
        password - The password to be associated with this user
        Throws:
        InvalidUsernameException - The supplied username is invalid
        InvalidPasswordException - The supplied password is invalid
        DuplicateUserException - The username is already in the vault

      • addNewSite

        java.lang.String addNewSite​(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password,
                            java.lang.String sitename)
                     throws DuplicateSiteException,
                            UserNotFoundException,
                            UserLockedOutException,
                            PasswordMismatchException,
                            InvalidSiteException
        Adds a new site to the vault for the user, generates, stores, and returns a password for that site. For example, if a user is creating an account at the site "amazon" for the first time, he/she calls the vault with the site name, and the site makes up a password for the user/site, returns the (plain text password to the user, and stores the (encrypted) password -- all stored passwords in the vault.
        Parameters:
        username - The username requesting the new site password
        password - Password for the username
        sitename - Name of the site for which the user is requesting a password
        Returns:
        A new (plaintext) password for the requested site
        Throws:
        DuplicateSiteException - There is already a site stored for this user
        UserNotFoundException - There is no such user in the vault
        UserLockedOutException - The user has been locked out due to too many incorrect password attempts
        PasswordMismatchException - The password supplied does not match the user's vault password
        InvalidSiteException - The site name supplied is invalid

      • updateSitePassword

        java.lang.String updateSitePassword​(java.lang.String username,
                                    java.lang.String password,
                                    java.lang.String sitename)
                             throws SiteNotFoundException,
                                    UserNotFoundException,
                                    UserLockedOutException,
                                    PasswordMismatchException
        Generate, store, and return an updated password for a site associated with the user. For example, the user wants to change his/her password on "amazon," and the system generates a new password, stores an encrypted version for the user, and returns the plaintext version.
        Parameters:
        username - The username requesting the new site password
        password - Password for the username
        sitename - Name of the site for which the user is requesting a password
        Returns:
        An updated (plaintext) password for the requested site
        Throws:
        SiteNotFoundException - The user has no password associated with this site
        UserNotFoundException - There is no such user in the vault
        UserLockedOutException - The user has been locked out due to too many incorrect password attempts
        PasswordMismatchException - The password supplied does not match the user's vault password

      • retrieveSitePassword

        java.lang.String retrieveSitePassword​(java.lang.String username,
                                      java.lang.String password,
                                      java.lang.String sitename)
                               throws SiteNotFoundException,
                                      UserNotFoundException,
                                      UserLockedOutException,
                                      PasswordMismatchException
        Retrieve the (plaintext) password for the user for the requested site. For example, the user supplies the name of a site, and if she has a stored password for the site, it is returned in plain text.
        Parameters:
        username - The username requesting the site password
        password - Password for the username
        sitename - Name of the site for which the user is requesting a password
        Returns:
        The (plaintext) password for the requested site
        Throws:
        SiteNotFoundException - The user has no password associated with this site
        UserNotFoundException - There is no such user in the vault
        UserLockedOutException - The user has been locked out due to too many incorrect password attempts
        PasswordMismatchException - The password supplied does not match the user's vault password
